participant_1.background:
Pink is my favorite color.
I am a yoga instructor.
My mother is dead.
I enjoy being alone.

participant_2.background:
I like early 2000s indie music.
My temper is pretty short.
I m picky when it comes to food.
I d like to be a teacher in the future.
I love my pet dog more than anything.

content.text: I like early 2000s indie music too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I love The Strokes, The Killers, and The White Stripes.
Those are all great bands! I also love The Shins and Modest Mouse.
I've never heard of The Shins or Modest Mouse. What kind of music do they play?
The Shins are a indie rock band from Albuquerque, New Mexico. Modest Mouse is an indie rock band from Issaquah, Washington.
I'll have to check them out.
I'm sure you'll like them.
So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a yoga instructor. I also like to spend time alone, reading, and listening to music.
That sounds like a nice way to relax.
It is. I love being able to decompress and focus on my own thoughts.
I can understand that. I'm a pretty introverted person, so I need a lot of alone time too.
It's nice to meet someone else who's like me.
Me too.
So, what do you want to be when you grow up?
I want to be a teacher. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's a great goal. I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thank you. I'm trying to get some experience working with kids, so I'm volunteering at my local elementary school.
That's great! I'm sure you'll learn a lot from the experience.
I'm already learning a lot. It's really rewarding to see how much the kids are learning.
That's awesome. I'm glad you're enjoying the experience.
